>Sharpclaws::
>
>"Stop and Weapons down!!!" comanded Hecate "You should know that
>Megatron and Blackarachnia are in war with our faction... and they
>betrayed Predacons ideal starting a civil war while enemy are the
>Alliance and the MAximals... "
>
>The males saw each other and they didn't move. Watting bot's reaction.
>
Strange Scorpion: "Meg, Megatron a traitor, you lie, he would never betray
the Predacon beliefs" he starts to clank his claws furiously "Megatron
great leader, always treated Scorponok with respect" he says again to no
one in perticular as he starts spining. Then he turns and realizes that he
is still being watched and starts to remember the fear of all those weapons
being drawn on him, clanking again he speaks.

Strange Scorpion: "Scorponok Terrorize" and with this the scorpion changes
to a robotic figuer with two pincher claws for hand and a tail errupting
out of the back, on his shoulders and calfs are wheels which he seems to
stare at in disbelief, then calms himself and stratens his posture and puts
a claw up to his head as if to salute.

Scorponok: "I am Skorponok, Preadacon second in command to Megatron, Thank
you for freeing me, but, what has happend to me, and who are you?" He says
as he points his claw almost accusingly.


OOC: Im assuming OOC means out of character right? Tell me if I'm making my
posts to long as I want no hard feelings.
